examples.translation: From this evening on, we're all the same

examples.text: Şu andan itibaren sadece resmi söylemi duyabileceksiniz.
examples.translation: From now on, you will only hear the official opinion.

examples.text: Bugünden itibaren hepiniz mikrodalga bölümünün elemanlarısınız.
examples.translation: Starting today, you are all members of the microwave division.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish اعتباراً, from Arabic اِعْتِبَارًا (iʕtibāran), adverbial accusative of اِعْتِبَار (iʕtibār). By surface analysis, itibar (“consideration”) + -en.
